events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it doesn't fit me at all and I would like to return it.
The case has been identified as a refund request based on the customer's message mentioning a return and refund.
The support request was assigned to refund specialist agent Lisa M. for further handling.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your order. I'm here to help you with the refund process for your jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and still with its original tags to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, unused, and I still have the tags attached as requested.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly. Once we receive the item, your payment will be refunded promptly.
That sounds great, thank you for the quick help. I look forward to receiving the label and returning the jacket soon.
I have now sent the prepaid return label to your email. If you have any questions during the return process, feel free to reach out.
Just checking in to see if you managed to send back the jacket and if you received the refund as expected.
Yes, I returned it last week and have already received the refund. Thanks again for the smooth process!
We are glad everything was resolved to your satisfaction. Closing the case now. Have a great day!
